endpoints.name: Documents

endpoints.name: Expenses

endpoints.name: Invoices

endpoints.suffix: /payment?clientid={Client ID?}&projectid={Project ID?}&personid={Person ID?}&date={Date Passed?:yyyy-MM-dd}&typeid={Type ID?}&invoiceid={Invoice ID?}
